title: Wine service: a guide for professional waiters
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation and Kingcroft Productions
brief_description: Produced by the Australian Wine Board, this work features the skills and knowledge required for wine waiting. A short instructional film, it aims to assist in making the right selection of wine varieties to match with food, relying on the knowledge of the restaurant staff. Get the insider knowledge from inside the waiters’ pantry: “it’s important you have a sound knowledge of your foods, and more particularly of your wines”.
